author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police are puzzled over the spurt in cases of motorcycles being set on fire.

On Sunday, two incidents of motorcycles being gutted were reported from Anna Nagar and Perambur.

Dakshinamurthy of Sathyasai Nagar in Anna Nagar had parked his vehicle outside his home; when he woke up on Monday morning, he was shocked to find his motorcycle completely charred.

Similarly, the motorcycle belonging to Perumal of Thiru Vi. Ka. Nagar was completely gutted in a fire.

Police sources said the cases were being investigated by Tirumangalam and Thiru Vi. Ka. Nagar police.

Residents of Ice House recalled that on December 13, seven motorcycles that were parked on Sivaraman Street went up in flames.

They want the city police to step up night patrolling to prevent such incidents of arson before this crime goes out of control.

The residents suspect a connection between the burning of motorcycles and the disappearance of milk trays stacked outside milk booths; they want the police to speed up investigation.

A senior official of the City Police said special crime teams were investigating these incidents.

title: Spurt in motorbikes being gutted
